basics.summary: Exploring tech, spirituality, and purpose in harmony. Join the journey!

work.name: FKS Group
work.business: FKS Group is a South-East Asian holding company focused on food, infrastructure and property. Its companies combine a strong commitment to logistics and infrastructure with deep domestic and international understanding to realize the potential of businesses and people across the region.
work.summary: My expertise encompasses full-stack development, agile methodologies, and a dedication to delivering high-quality code. I thrive in collaborative environments, adapting to the latest technologies, and finding creative solutions to complex challenges. My mission is to contribute to technological advancement and create software that enhances user experiences and business operations.

skills.frontend: Asp.Net Core, Spring MVC, Bootstrap, Jquery, Laravel
skills.others: Git, Nginx, Apache, Rest API, Firebase, Redis, AWS
